turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The sales meeting is going to run over tonight, can you see about getting some pizzas from Bertucci's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, did you want to order from the one on Amherst Street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the easiest one for us to get to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I can order them online for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good, we've got 12 people, How many pizzas should we order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 should be enough but I'd make it 5 just in case you are all super hungry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, Let's get 5 large pizza and make sure they throw in lots of bread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want some salads as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's a great idea. Get a couple of large salads as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What pizzas did you want to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get one Pepperoni, and 2 classic margheritas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want the one with all the sausage, It's called the Sporkie?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, one of those and also the Silano white pizza one with chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that's 1 Bertucci, 2 margheritas, 1 Silano and 1 Sporkie.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and get 3 garden salads with oil and vinegar on the side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, I'll make sure they throw in plenty of rolls too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. we need butter, plates, silverware and napkins. Try to make sure we get everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. So it's 5 pizzas, 3 salads and the rolls. Is that everything.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It should be.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is in and it will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. I put it under the company name and the payment is on the account.
